message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, $10,000 is quite low considering the true value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I'm willing to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,750. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I'm seeing we're getting closer.  To show you I'm serious about making this work, I can come down slightly to $11,100.  This is my best offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $11,100. How about we try $10,550?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I need to be firm on my price.  I can do $11,000, but I can't go any lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to keep costs down. Can you meet me at $10,000?
